page.title: 02Farming in Westhill.
page.content: Four farms were surveyed namely Berryhill,belonging to one farmer and Gullymoss,Sunnyhill and Souterhill all belonging to another farmer. Berryhill specialises in{calf rearing. Gullymoss,Souterhill,and Sunnyhill specialise in{mixed farming}The farms' {equipment}include tractors, combine harvestors,grain dryers,ploughs, harrows,rollers,drills,carts,forklifts mowers,land levellers,loaders and cultivators.The farm{animals}include cattle,hens,turkeys,sheep and dogs. The{farm acreages}range from 100 at Berryhill to 230 at Gullymoss which includes Souterhill and Sunnyhill. These acres are used for turnips, potatoes,corn,barley,grass and hay. The cattle are fed on turnips and hay in winter and grass in the summer.This diet helps the cattle gain weight.
